attributes.action: Ban Smoking in all welsh Hospitals Including Psychiatric Units
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Please sign this petition to ban smoking in ALL hospitals in Wales to include Psychiatric Hospitals.
Staff and patients who do  not smoke are being exposed to second hand smoke every day in hospitals in Wales.
Due to the Welsh Assembly Government deciding that Psychiatric Hospitals should be excempt from the UK smoking ban law, Staff and patients are having their health put at risk. Stop this practice now and save some lives.

rejection.details: This is a petition for the Welsh Assembly, not for the Prime Minister. Please submit your petition to the devolved administration.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
